overview:
Guillaume Jarysta-Dautel is currently CEO of Devolia, a full-service, integrated digital agency.

Professional Experience

Since September 2006: Co-founder and CTO, Rien à me mettre (Paris, France).

Since September 2005: Founder and CEO, Devolia (Paris, France).

Publications & conferences

Since 2010: Innovative projects coach at the Ecole des Gobelins incubator.

Since 2010: PHP and Web Services (Yearly conference at the CCI Master – Tours University)

Since Jan. 2007: Author of the IT Strategy weblog

June 2006: Nominee at the ASP Trophies 2006, ASP Forum, France

June 2006: PHP-based publishing platforms (Conference at the New York PHP Conference & Expo 2006)

2005: Software Engineering of a web application, part 1 and part 2 (Articles for Direction|PHP, August and September 2005)

Education

2005: Engineer Degree (Master) at the Ecole Nationale Supérieure d’Electricité et de Mécanique (French Grande Ecole of engineering, Nancy, France), Institut National Polytechnique de Lorraine University.

degrees.subject: Automated Systems Engineering
degrees.institution: Ecole Nationale Supérieure d'Electricité et de Mécanique
